step1.title: Step 1 : Browse Guides’ Qualifications and Expertise
step1.description: Explore a variety of tour guide profiles on the platform, learn about their qualifications, specialties, and watch their self-introduction videos. Pick the local expert that suits your needs best.

step2.title: Step 2 : Contact Your Guide
step2.description: After logging in, message your selected guide to discuss your travel needs, preferred dates, and special interests in detail to ensure a customized experience.

step3.title: Step 3 : Start Your Journey
step3.description: Once everything is confirmed, pack your bags and get ready for an unforgettable Paris journey guided by a professional.

step1.title: Step 1: Browse Itinerary Proposals
step1.description: Explore a variety of carefully crafted itineraries on our platform—from cultural adventures to culinary tours, there's one to spark your wanderlust.

step2.title: Step 2: Sign Up for a Tour
step2.description: Once you've found your favorite tour, log in to register and secure your spot. You can also connect with other participants to share your excitement.

step3.title: Step 3: Group Confirmation Notification
step3.description: When the group tour is confirmed, you’ll receive a notification along with detailed info about meeting points and times.

step4.title: Step 4: Start Your Journey
step4.description: Once everything is confirmed, pack your bags and get ready for an unforgettable Paris journey led by a professional guide.
